results.title: Effects of atenolol on regional myocardial blood flow and ST segment elevation in the canine myocardium.
results.text_hl: Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on regional myocardial blood flow and ST segment elevation in the canine @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@myocardium@@@.

citations.NLM: Berdaux A, Bossier JR, Giudicelli JF. Effects of atenolol on regional myocardial blood flow and ST segment elevation in the canine myocardium. Br J Pharmacol. 1977 Jul;60(3):433-9. PMID: 890211

results.title: Heart rate reduction during exercise-induced myocardial ischaemia and stunning.
results.text_hl: The effects of selective heart rate reduction by @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ (If inhibitor) were compared to those of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on exercise-induced @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunning@@@.

citations.NLM: Monnet X, Colin P, Ghaleh B, Hittinger L, Giudicelli JF, Berdeaux A. Heart rate reduction during exercise-induced myocardial ischaemia and stunning. Eur Heart J. 2004 Apr;25(7):579-86. PMID: 15120055
citations.BibTeX: @article{15120055, title={Heart rate reduction during exercise-induced myocardial ischaemia and stunning.}, author={Monnet X and Colin P and Ghaleh B and Hittinger L and Giudicelli JF and Berdeaux A}, journal={Eur Heart J}, volume={25}, number={7}, pages={579-86}}

results.title: beta 2-Adrenergic stimulation is involved in the contractile dysfunction of the stunned heart.
results.text_hl: To ascertain which specific @GENE_FDXR @GENE_79122 @@@AR@@@ pathway was involved in the effects of @CHEMICAL_Catecholamines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002395 @@@catecholamines@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@stunned heart@@@, selective @GENE_FDXR @GENE_79122 @@@AR@@@ blockers, @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ (@GENE_UGT1A6 @GENE_113992 @@@alpha 1@@@-blocker), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (beta 1-blocker), @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118,551@@@ (@GENE_UGT1A2 @GENE_396527 @@@beta 2@@@-blocker) and selective inhibitors of Gi-PI3K pathway (pertussis toxin and @CHEMICAL_Wortmannin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077191 @@@wortmannin@@@) were alternatively combined.

citations.NLM: Vittone L, Said M, Mattiazzi A. beta 2-Adrenergic stimulation is involved in the contractile dysfunction of the stunned heart. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2006 Apr;373(1):60-70. PMID: 16575588
citations.BibTeX: @article{16575588, title={beta 2-Adrenergic stimulation is involved in the contractile dysfunction of the stunned heart.}, author={Vittone L and Said M and Mattiazzi A}, journal={Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol}, volume={373}, number={1}, pages={60-70}}

results.title: [The electrophysiologic effect of atenolol and nitrendipine on normal and ischemic rabbit myocardium in situ. III. Effects on ventricular fibrillation threshold].
results.journal: Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: The results showed that: (1) VFT is a quantitative index of @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathies @DISEASE_MESH:D009202 @@@myocardial@@@ vulnerability: (2) MET, positively correlated with VFT, might become a substitute for VFT as an index of vulnerability to @DISEASE_Ventricular_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D014693 @@@ventricular fibrillation@@@: (3) @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, both in normal and @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischemic myocardium@@@, is able to make a significant elevation of VFT, which is considered as an antifibrillation effect: (4) @CHEMICAL_Nitrendipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009568 @@@nitrendipine@@@ exerted no apparent effects on all the parameters.

citations.NLM: Ren XL, Lin CX. [The electrophysiologic effect of atenolol and nitrendipine on normal and ischemic rabbit myocardium in situ. III. Effects on ventricular fibrillation threshold]. Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi. 1989 Apr;17(2):80-2, 125-6. PMID: 2791881
citations.BibTeX: @article{2791881, title={[The electrophysiologic effect of atenolol and nitrendipine on normal and ischemic rabbit myocardium in situ. III. Effects on ventricular fibrillation threshold].}, author={Ren XL and Lin CX}, journal={Zhonghua Xin Xue Guan Bing Za Zhi}, volume={17}, number={2}, pages={80-2, 125-6}}
